scripts.tag: standard-version && npm run update-remote && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish
scripts.dev:desktop: concurrently -n client,server,electron -c green,blue,magenta "npm:unicon-client" "npm:unicon-server" "npm --prefix desktop run dev:with-server"
scripts.desktop:pack: npm --prefix client run build && node desktop/scripts/copy-dist.js && npm --prefix desktop run build
